name: KYIVSTAR
description: Kyivstar provides mobile communications & Internet services to over 26 million Ukrainians
sampleDescriptions: Kyivstar has built and operates Ukraine's largest mobile communications infrastructure, consisting of 48,000 base stations, and is one of the twenty largest taxpayers in Ukraine and the largest taxpay
